metadata.title: CVE-2022-35020 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via thecomponent __interceptor_memcpy at/sanitizer_common/sanitizer_common_interceptors.inc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35020` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 2.1-2.1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-2.1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
